a.column_query: id, a_name, a_cat1, a_cat2, a_int, a_real
a.queryStats: select min(a_int) as a_int_min, max(a_int) as a_int_max, min(a_real) as a_real_min, max(a_real) as a_real_max from ${table}
a.queryCategories: select distinct %s as Category from ${table} where Category is not null and Category <> ''
a.querySample: select ${targid_dummy.index} from ${table} t order by random() limit %s
a.querySort: select ${targid_dummy.index}, %s as _score from ${table} t order by _score %s

b.column_query: id, b_name, b_cat1, b_cat2, b_int, b_real
b.queryStats: select min(b_int) as b_int_min, max(b_int) as b_int_max, min(b_real) as b_real_min, max(b_real) as b_real_max from ${table}
b.queryCategories: select distinct %s as Category from ${table} where Category is not null and Category <> ''
b.querySample: select ${targid_dummy.index} from ${table} t order by random() limit %s
b.querySort: select ${targid_dummy.index}, %s as _score from ${table} t order by _score %s

ab.column_query: t.id, t.b_name, t.b_cat1, avg(p.ab_real) as ab_real
ab.queryStats: select min(ab_real) as ab_real_min, max(ab_real) as ab_real_max from ab
ab.queryCategories: select distinct %s as Category from b where Category is not null and Category <> ''
ab.query: select ${targid_dummy.index}, ${column_query} FROM b t INNER JOIN ab p on t.id = p.b_id WHERE p.a_id = :name AND p.ab_real %s :value GROUP BY t.id

ab_values.query: select ${targid_dummy.index}, b_id as id, ab_int as value FROM ab t WHERE a_id = :a_id
